desc: Juju Decor is a high end retailer & wholesaler, of authentically made, animal friendly, feather Juju Hats. They are all unique and handcrafted by the Bamileke tribespeople in Cameroon, Africa. These feather wall hangings are the newest luxury decor trend spreading across the world.

layout.text: Custom made by the Bamileke tribespeople of Cameroon. Back in Stock!!!!
